name: The Organ Donor
description:
The Organ Donor is a top-down puzzle game with an uncommon mechanic: You can transfer organs from one alien to another on an adjacent tile! You'll need to find the best solutions to complete all the various levels. Try to keep your aliens well organ-ized or you won't be able to pass the obstacles!

CONTROLS

Select alien - Clicking with mouse

Move - WASD

Interaction - Space

Splitting organs - Dragging with mouse

A GAME MAKER'S TOOL KIT 2021 PROJECT

This game was made within a 48-hour period by two people for the 2021 GMTK game jam. Very first game jams for both of us!

CREDITS

https://carbontrex.itch.io/ - Mert Yılmaz

https://umutozen.itch.io/ - Umut Eren Özen
